messages.message: Function call_user_method() is deprecated since PHP 5.3 and removed since PHP 7.0; Use call_user_func() instead
"const" keyword is not present in PHP version 5.2 or earlier
Constant arrays using the "const" keyword are not allowed in PHP 5.5 or earlier
Short array syntax (open) is available since 5.4
Short array syntax (close) is available since 5.4
The keyword 'self' was treated in a case-sensitive fashion in certain cases in PHP 5.4 or earlier. Use the lowercase version for consistent support.
